overview:
Christian is a real ‘go-getter’, ready to roll up his sleeves to get things done. He’s passionate about business, has this typical entrepreneurial drive and ‘fine nose’ for the right business opportunities.

Christian Richter graduated in economics & software engineering at Hamburg University. In 1998, he founded his first WebTV production company “All InSite”.

After selling the company, he worked as a product development manager for Deutsche Telekom Innovations in Berlin.

In 2006, Christian Richter was asked by Madsack Media to setup “The Medialab”, Hamburg, where he founded the radio aggregator radio.de, radio.fr & rad.io in 2007. End of 2009, he left radio.de to found his own Media Company: COMPUTERROCK.NET, where he is counsulting & developing online services for Digital 5 (radio consortium of the 10 largest private radiostations in Germany) and ARD Sales & services for their internet strategy.

In 2010 he was a asked to become a senior lecturer @ Martin Luther University Halle/Wittenberg

In 2011 he founded the Wathory Software GmbH & Co KG

Starting as a pet project together with the angel investor Marc Griefahn he now leads “BEETmobile” as CEO and co-founder to take on mobile internet access to another level
